text: @ArvindKejriwal Bullshit.. my neighbours r Covid19 positive 4 days no testing by all the private labs .. they did not had testing kits. All of us are on our own no government will come for us. You needed money and u unlocked . U wanted us to work and earn for your taxes. Bagwan bachaye sabko 🙏
